          <title>
            <string language="sl">V učilnici - križanka</string>
            <string language="en">In the classroom - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Klassenzimmer - Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la salle de classe - mots croisé</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">En la sala de clase - crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Križanka sestavljena iz besed povezanih z učilnico.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword puzzle build of terms related to the classroom.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">učilnica</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtselbau von Bezeichnungen stand auf 
dem Klassenzimmer in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction de jeu de mots croisé des limites 
liées à la salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A configuração do enigma de crossword dos 
termos relacionou-se à sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La configurazione di cruciverba dei termini si è
riferita all'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή γρίφων σταυρόλεξων των όρων σχετικών με την
τάξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura del crucigrama de los términos 
relacionados con la sala de clase.</string>
